unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Jadeja's knee? Last I heard from Dr. Patil it was touch-and-go. Hope he recovers soon, that guy is a legend! Also, what about Bumrah's back? Heard they were doing rehab at the NCA in Bangalore. I hope it's not another Hardik Pandya situation, yaar. This India-Pak match needs him! Heard the new stadium is around 10,000 sq ft. Hope all the players are fit for it. We need those crucial Rs to win, right?
